name: Monster Hunter Pokke Farmer
description:
Monster Hunter is a series beloved for its colorful monsters, lush environments, and tight combat. So naturally we're taking all of that away.

As Pokke Village's newest farmer, you're in charge of growing, mining, fishing, and gathering everything a hunter needs to succeed. This is a Mon Hun throwback focused on the quiet village life.

Made using GB Studio for GB Compo 2021.

Demo currently available as a Game Boy ROM, playable on hardware or emulator.

Follow me on Twitter

Thanks to Timisrllybored for  music and sound: his Music Cartridge submission.

Future updates are planned to bring more quests, hunters, and life to the Game Boy's Pokke Village.
